content: {"name": "Every Day is a Miracle", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Use our digital reservation system to secure your place in line at your nearest EDM food pantry and schedule an appointment that suits your availability. https://edmnyc.my.site.com/reservation/s/edmreservation?language=en_US\nOn site registration is also available ( inside Emolior Academy)", "email": "", "url": "https://edmnyc.org/supermarket-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1970 West Farms Road", "address_2": null, "city": "West Farms", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10460", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.839194, "longitude": -73.880286}, "phones": [{"number": "(347) 618-1162", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}]}
